free: #e Once upon a time, our ancestors told their descendants ...
#c 從前，祖先告訴他們的子女，

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e In our flatland in the mountain,
#c 我們山上的地，

風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e There came a man who told the people to build a boat.
#c 有一個人來跟大家說，要造一艘船。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The people did not listen to him.
#c 大家都不聽他的話。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e He went around and told each family to build a boat.
#c 他走到各家，吩咐他們要造船。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Nobody paid attention to him.
#c 沒有人聽他的話。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e He said that if they didn't believe, their land will sink.
#c 他們若不相信，他們的地都會沈下去。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Everybody did not believe him, except for one family.
#c 除了一個家庭之外，沒有人相信他。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The gods will protect those who believe.
#c 神會保護相信他的人。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e After the dirty person, who is a god, convinced the family, they believed and started to build a boat.
#c 有一家人聽完那人的話，就相信他，開始造船。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The boat was wide and big.
#c 船寬又大。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e It took a long time to build the boat.
#c 造船需要很長的時間。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Finally, the boat was completed.
#c 船做完以後，

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e And the god came to see it.
#c 神就來看看。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e And said, your boat has been finished.
#c 他說，你們的船造好了。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e If it has been finished,
#c 如果做好了，

風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The god, the man with dirty appearance, (called and) kept the animals inside.
#c 外表骯髒的神就把所有的動物叫進船裡。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e All the animals came.

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e His boat was finished.

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e They were assigned spaces.
#c 分配了位子給他們。

free: #e They were called and kept in a room.

風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e There was room for putting the rice and water, as well as for the animals and the family members.
#c 有地方放米，有地方放水，有地方放狗，每個人都有各自的地方。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The animals were brought first into the boat. The people entered last.
#c 動物先帶進船內；人最後進去。

free: #e They entered inside.

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Close it like this inside.
#c 裡面要這樣鎖住。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e I will lock you inside from outside; you will be inside.
#c 我要從外面把門反鎖；你們都在裡面。

free: #e If somebody comes, do not open it.

free: #e Don't open it.

free: #e Neighbors in the village came and called.

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e They believed what the man had said were true.

#c 船的裡面在搖晃。

free: #e We sat down as the boat started to move.
#c 船一搖晃，我們就坐下來。

free: #e The boat, we did not know what happened. It got stuck. It's not moving anymore.
#c 我們不知道發生什麼事了。船卡住了，不再動。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

#c 過了不久，

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e (since) they could not find a way out.
#c （因為）他們找不到出口。

風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e Everything stabled. The boat was not rocking anymore. (They) opened the door.
#c 一切都平靜下來，船不再搖晃。他們就打開門。

風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e They opened (the door), and saw the mountains were not the same.
#c 他們就打開門。他們看到山都不一樣。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The flatland was not there. The trees were not there. The grassland was not there.
#c 平地不再有；樹木不再有；草地不再有。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e There had been a landslide.
#c 有發生山崩。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e They said everything would be all right.
#c 他們說一切都會很好。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e How do we get down?
#c 要如何下去呢？

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e He went to work.
#c 他就開始工作。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e He went to look for rice.
#c 他就去找米。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e He set the animals free.
#c 他放所有的動物自由。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e They took rice to plant on the land.
#c 他們拿了米去種在土地上。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The door was shut tight.
#c 門緊緊地被鎖住。

風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The have forgotten how to open it as the gods have instructed them.
#c 他們已經忘記神的吩咐怎麼打開門。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The mice set free returned to the boat and built their nest there.
#c 被放自由的老鼠回到船上，把牠們的窩擺在裡面。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The mice saw (the inside of the boat).
#c 老鼠看到（船的裡面）。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The grassland is where they could get down and stay to do planting.
#c 草地上是他們可以下去的地方，在那裡種植。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e The mice gnawed a hole on the wood and ate the rice and seed.
#c 老鼠在木頭上啃了一個洞，吃掉米和種子。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e When they were about to leave, the two bundles of rice hanging were grabbed away.
#c 他們正要離去的時候，掛著的兩袋米被抓走了。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28
風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e They planted those millets that they took back. When those millets grew up, they found that there are two kinds: one is glutinous rice and the other Zai-lai rice.
#c 被他們搶回來的稻種, 拿去播種之後, 發現有兩種, 一種是糯米, 一種是在來米。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e More and more people there were.
#c 漸漸變很多人。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e More and more tribes there were.
#c 村莊也很多。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e There was fire.
#c 火也有了。

meta.speaker: 風玉雲, waon a bo:ong, female, 1943-2-28

free: #e There are roads.
#c 道路也有了。
